# Depositing Shiny apps

In order for Shiny apps to be published to the IDN, the code behind them must also be made publicly available and deposited in a DOI issuing repository. It's possible to easily integrate this into your workflow for developing your shiny app by following this guide to [depositing shiny apps programmatically](deposit-shiny-app.html)
